review.description: Fabulous pizza- good crust, good sauce, good cheese, good people! This place is a little shack located next to lots of other hole in the wall stores- many of which are also under-rated (I got spare keys made for a $1.50 at the repair shop  next door). I actually came out a few cents short when paying for my pizza, and was going to run to a bank, and the guy at the counter insisted that I just pay what I could. I have promised him I'll be back, and will pay a little extra for my next piece:) God knows, the pizza is worth more than they are charging.
review.author: B K.

review.description: its really hard to find a good pizzeria in ny, and its good to know i have one a block away from me lol AND that delivers!!!! but it has to be $15.00 and up to get it delivered. every month i get a pie from them and it never disappoints.
review.author: Shereme G.

review.description: worst delivery ever. waited nearly 2 hours on a thursday evening for my food. not even the best pizza is worth the 2 hour wait. called twice for an update on my order and each time they told us it was "leaving the store in 2 minutes." worst service - will never be ordering from here again. i suggest you don't either.
review.author: Laura F.
